languages.text: "Я тоже. Дух наставника не обрел покоя. Он все еще здесь и жаждет искупления. Жаждет быть полезным, жаждет... спасти".

traits.locale_text: "Я тоже. Дух наставника не обрел покоя. Он все еще здесь и жаждет искупления. Жаждет быть полезным, жаждет... спасти".

languages.text: "I saw him, too. Our mentor's spirit has found no rest. He is still here, yearning for redemption. Yearning to be useful, to be... a saviour."
languages.original_text: "Я тоже. Дух наставника не обрел покоя. Он все еще здесь и жаждет искупления. Жаждет быть полезным, жаждет... спасти".

traits.locale_text: "Me too. Our mentor's spirit has found no rest. He is still here, yearning for redemption. Yearning to be useful, to be... a saviour."
"Me too. Our mentor's spirit has found no rest. He is still here, yearning for redemption. Yearning to be useful, to be... a saviour."
"I saw him, too. Our mentor's spirit has found no rest. He is still here, yearning for redemption. Yearning to be useful, to be... a saviour."
"I saw him, too. Our mentor's spirit has found no rest. He is still here, yearning for redemption. Yearning to be useful, to be... a saviour."
"I saw him, too. Our mentor's spirit has found no rest. He is still here, yearning for redemption. Yearning to be useful, to be... a saviour."
"I saw him, too. Our mentor's spirit has found no rest. He is still here, yearning for redemption. Yearning to be useful, to be... a saviour."

languages.text: « Moi aussi, je l'ai vu. L'esprit de notre mentor n'a pas trouvé le repos. Il est encore là, en quête de rédemption, à chercher désespérément à se rendre utile... à vouloir sauver le monde. »
languages.original_text: "I saw him, too. Our mentor's spirit has found no rest. He is still here, yearning for redemption. Yearning to be useful, to be... a saviour."

traits.locale_text: « Moi aussi, je l'ai vu. L'esprit de notre mentor n'a pas trouvé le repos. Il est encore là, en quête de rédemption, à chercher désespérément à se rendre utile... à vouloir sauver le monde. »

languages.text: «Yo también lo vi. El espíritu de nuestro mentor no descansa. Sigue aquí, ansiando la redención. Anhelando ser útil. Anhelando ser... un salvador».
languages.original_text: "I saw him, too. Our mentor's spirit has found no rest. He is still here, yearning for redemption. Yearning to be useful, to be... a saviour."

traits.locale_text: «Yo también lo vi. El espíritu de nuestro mentor no descansa. Sigue aquí, ansiando la redención. Anhelando ser útil. Anhelando ser... un salvador».

languages.text: 「私も彼を見ました。我々の恩師の魂は安らかに眠れていないのです。まだここに留まり、救済を強く求めています。役に立ちたい、救世主になりたいと…」
languages.original_text: "I saw him, too. Our mentor's spirit has found no rest. He is still here, yearning for redemption. Yearning to be useful, to be... a saviour."

traits.locale_text: 「私も彼を見ました。我々の恩師の魂は安らかに眠れていないのです。まだここに留まり、救済を強く求めています。役に立ちたい、救世主になりたいと…」

languages.text: “我也见到他了。导师的灵魂一直没有安息，他还留在这里，渴望救赎。他渴望成为有用的人，渴望……拯救别人。”
languages.original_text: "I saw him, too. Our mentor's spirit has found no rest. He is still here, yearning for redemption. Yearning to be useful, to be... a saviour."

traits.locale_text: “我也见到他了。导师的灵魂一直没有安息，他还留在这里，渴望救赎。他渴望成为有用的人，渴望……拯救别人。”

languages.text: "Ich habe ihn auch gesehen. Der Geist unseres Mentors hat keine Ruhe gefunden. Er ist immer noch hier und sehnt sich nach Erlösung. Er sehnt sich danach, nützlich zu sein ... ein Retter."
languages.original_text: "I saw him, too. Our mentor's spirit has found no rest. He is still here, yearning for redemption. Yearning to be useful, to be... a saviour."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe ihn auch gesehen. Der Geist unseres Mentors hat keine Ruhe gefunden. Er ist immer noch hier und sehnt sich nach Erlösung. Er sehnt sich danach, nützlich zu sein ... ein Retter."

languages.text: "Onu ben de gördüm. Yönderimizin ruhu huzura ermemiş. Hâlâ burada, kefareti arzuluyor. Bir işe yaramayı, bir... Kurtarıcı olmayı arzuluyor."
languages.original_text: "I saw him, too. Our mentor's spirit has found no rest. He is still here, yearning for redemption. Yearning to be useful, to be... a saviour."
